type OracleCommand = class inherit DbCommand interface ICloneable

summary.span: 表示要對資料庫執行的 SQL 陳述式或預存程序。

span.span: Represents an SQL statement or stored procedure to execute against a database.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類型已被取代，並將.NET Framework 的未來版本中移除。This type is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of the .NET Framework. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Oracle 和 ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/oracle-and-adonet.md)。For more information, see [Oracle and ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/oracle-and-adonet.md). 類別提供下列方法來針對資料來源執行命令：The class provides the following methods for executing commands against a data source: |項目Item|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| ||執行傳回資料列的命令。Executes commands that return rows.| ||針對 執行 SQL 陳述式，並傳回受影響的資料列數。Executes an SQL statement against the and returns the number of rows affected.| ||執行命令，例如 SQL 插入、 刪除、 更新和 SET 陳述式。Executes commands such as SQL INSERT, DELETE, UPDATE, and SET statements.| ||從資料庫擷取單一值 （例如，彙總的值），為.NET Framework 資料型別。Retrieves a single value (for example, an aggregate value) from a database as a .NET Framework data type.| ||從資料庫擷取單一值 （例如，彙總的值），做為 Oracle 特定資料類型。Retrieves a single value (for example, an aggregate value) from a database as an Oracle-specific data type.| 您可以重設屬性和重複使用物件。You can reset the property and reuse the object. 如果命令執行會導致嚴重，則可能會關閉。If execution of the command results in a fatal , the may close. 但是，使用者可以再次開啟連線，然後繼續進行。However, the user can reopen the connection and continue. > [!NOTE] > 不同於**命令**中的其他.NET Framework 資料提供者 （SQL Server、 OLE DB 和 ODBC） 的物件objekt nepodporuje屬性。Unlike the **Command** object in the other .NET Framework data providers (SQL Server, OLE DB, and ODBC), the object does not support a property. 設定命令逾時有任何作用，傳回的值也永遠是零。Setting a command timeout has no effect and the value returned is always zero. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，連同和，以從資料表選取資料列。The following example uses the method of , along with and , to select rows from a table. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 嘗試取消 的執行。

span.span: Attempts to cancel the execution of an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有取消，會發生任何事。If there is nothing to cancel, nothing happens. 不過，如果正在進行命令，而取消作業的嘗試失敗，則不會產生任何例外狀況 (Exception)。However, if there is a command in process, and the attempt to cancel fails, no exception is generated. ## Examples 下列範例會建立，會執行它，然後取消執行。The following example creates an , executes it, then cancels the execution. 若要這麼做，方法會傳遞為 SQL SELECT 陳述式的字串和要用來連接到資料庫的字串。To accomplish this, the method is passed a string that is an SQL SELECT statement and a string to use to connect to the database. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleCommand.Cancel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.Cancel/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleCommand.Cancel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.Cancel/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定要針對資料庫執行的 SQL 陳述式或預存程序。

span.span: Gets or sets the SQL statement or stored procedure to execute against the database.

value.span: 要執行的 SQL 陳述式或預存程序。

span.span: The SQL statement or stored procedure to execute.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`StoredProcedure`，則屬性應設為預存程序的名稱。When the property is set to `StoredProcedure`, the property should be set to the name of the stored procedure. 使用者可能需要使用逸出字元語法，如果預存程序名稱包含任何特殊字元。The user may be required to use escape character syntax if the stored procedure name contains any special characters. 當您呼叫 Execute 方法的其中一個命令會執行這個預存程序。The command executes this stored procedure when you call one of the Execute methods. 將參數傳遞給 SQL 陳述式所呼叫的.NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle 不支援問號 （？） 預留位置的`CommandType.Text`。The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle does not support the question mark (?) placeholder for passing parameters to an SQL statement called by an of `CommandType.Text`. 在此情況下，您必須使用具名的參數。In this case, named parameters must be used. 例如: For example: ``` SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = :pCustomerID ``` 當使用具名參數的 SQL 陳述式中呼叫的`CommandType.Text`，您必須在參數名稱，使用冒號 （:）。When using named parameters in an SQL statement called by an of `CommandType.Text`, you must precede the parameter name with a colon (:). 不過，在預存程序中，或參考您的程式碼中的其他位置的具名參數 (例如，在新增時，才物件新增至屬性)，不在之前使用冒號 （:） 的具名的參數。However, in a stored procedure, or when referring to a named parameter elsewhere in your code (for example, when adding objects to the property), do not precede the named parameter with a colon (:). .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle 自動提供冒號。The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle supplies the colon automatically. ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定其部分屬性。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleCommand.CommandText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.CommandText/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleCommand.CommandText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.CommandText/VB/source.vb#1)]

value.span: 等待命令執行的時間 (以秒為單位)。

span.span: The time (in seconds) to wait for the command to execute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果會產生指派屬性值小於 0。An is generated if the assigned property value is less than 0.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示如何解譯 屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating how the property is interpreted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`StoredProcedure`，您應該設定完整的 Oracle call 語法的屬性。When the property is set to `StoredProcedure`, you should set the property to the full Oracle call syntax. 命令再執行這個預存程序，當您呼叫其中一個 Execute 方法 (例如或)。The command then executes this stored procedure when you call one of the Execute methods (for example, or ). ，和屬性 nelze nastavit，pokud 目前連接正在執行 execute 或擷取作業。The , and properties cannot be set if the current connection is performing an execute or fetch operation. 將參數傳遞給 SQL 陳述式所呼叫的.NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle 不支援問號 （？） 預留位置的`CommandType.Text`。The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle does not support the question mark (?) placeholder for passing parameters to an SQL statement called by an of `CommandType.Text`. 在此情況下，您必須使用具名的參數。In this case, named parameters must be used. 例如: For example: ``` SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = :pCustomerID ``` 當使用具名參數的 SQL 陳述式中呼叫的`CommandType.Text`，您必須在參數名稱，使用冒號 （:）。When using named parameters in an SQL statement called by an of `CommandType.Text`, you must precede the parameter name with a colon (:). 不過，在預存程序中，或參考您的程式碼中的其他位置的具名參數 (例如，在新增時，才物件新增至屬性)，不在之前使用冒號 （:） 的具名的參數。However, in a stored procedure, or when referring to a named parameter elsewhere in your code (for example, when adding objects to the property), do not precede the named parameter with a colon (:). .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle 自動提供冒號。The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle supplies the colon automatically. ## Examples 下列範例會建立衍生類別的執行個體並設定其部分屬性。The following example creates an instance of a derived class and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleCommand.CommandType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.CommandType/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleCommand.CommandType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.CommandType/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 的這個執行個體所使用的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the used by this instance of the .
The connection to a data source.
The default is a null value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您無法設定， ，和如果目前的連接正在執行 execute 或提取作業的屬性。You cannot set the , , and properties if the current connection is performing an execute or fetch operation. 如果在異動進行時設定 ，且 屬性不是 null，則會產生 。If you set while a transaction is in progress and the property is not null, an is generated. 如果您設定交易已經認可或回復之後，屬性不是 null，屬性則設為 null 值。If you set after the transaction has been committed or rolled back, and the property is not null, the property is then set to a null value. ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定其部分屬性。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleCommand.Connection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.Connection/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleCommand.Connection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.Connection/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 當交易正在進行中時， 屬性會變更。

span.span: The property was changed while a transaction was in progress.

summary.span: 針對 執行 SQL 陳述式，並傳回受影響的資料列數。

span.span: Executes an SQL statement against the and returns the number of rows affected.

returns.span: 對 UPDATE、INSERT 和 DELETE 陳述式而言，傳回值是受命令影響的資料列數目。

span.span: For UPDATE, INSERT, and DELETE statements, the return value is the number of rows affected by the command.

returns.span: 對於 CREATE TABLE 和 DROP TABLE 陳述式，傳回值為 0。

span.span: For CREATE TABLE and DROP TABLE statements, the return value is 0.

returns.span: 對其他類型的陳述式而言，傳回值為 -1。

span.span: For all other types of statements, the return value is -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用來執行資料庫目錄作業 （例如，查詢資料庫的結構或建立資料庫物件，例如資料表）; 或在資料庫中，將資料變更而不需使用、 藉由執行更新、 插入或刪除陳述式。You can use to perform catalog operations (for example, querying the structure of a database or creating database objects such as tables); or to change the data in a database, without using a , by executing UPDATE, INSERT, or DELETE statements. 雖然不會傳回任何資料列，而任何輸出參數或傳回對應至參數的值會填入資料。Although does not return any rows, any output parameters or return values mapped to parameters are populated with data. 對 UPDATE、INSERT 和 DELETE 陳述式而言，傳回值是受命令影響的資料列數目。For UPDATE, INSERT, and DELETE statements, the return value is the number of rows affected by the command. 對於 CREATE TABLE 和 DROP TABLE 陳述式，傳回值為 0。For CREATE TABLE and DROP TABLE statements, the return value is 0. 對其他類型的陳述式而言，傳回值為 -1。For all other types of statements, the return value is -1. 發生復原時，傳回的值也是-1。If a rollback occurs, the return value is also -1. ## Examples 下列範例會建立，然後執行它使用。The following example creates an and then executes it by using . 此範例會傳遞為 SQL 陳述式 （例如 UPDATE、 INSERT 或 DELETE） 的字串和要用來連接到資料庫的字串。The example is passed a string that is an SQL statement (such as UPDATE, INSERT, or DELETE) and a string to use to connect to the database. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleCommand.ExecuteNonQuery#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.ExecuteNonQuery/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleCommand.ExecuteNonQuery#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.ExecuteNonQuery/VB/source.vb#1)]

param.name: rowid
param.span: 伺服器中實際資料列 ID 的 Base64 字串表示。

span.span: A base64 string representation of the actual row ID in the server.

summary.span: 針對 執行 SQL 陳述式，並傳回受影響的資料列數。

span.span: Executes an SQL statement against the and returns the number of rows affected.

returns.span: 對 UPDATE、INSERT 和 DELETE 陳述式而言，傳回值是受命令影響的資料列數目。

span.span: For UPDATE, INSERT, and DELETE statements, the return value is the number of rows affected by the command.

returns.span: 對於 CREATE TABLE 和 DROP TABLE 陳述式，傳回值為 0。

span.span: For CREATE TABLE and DROP TABLE statements, the return value is 0.

returns.span: 對其他類型的陳述式而言，傳回值為 -1。

span.span: For all other types of statements, the return value is -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用來執行資料庫目錄作業 （例如，查詢資料庫的結構或建立資料庫物件，例如資料表）; 或在資料庫中，將資料變更而不需使用、 藉由執行更新、 插入或刪除陳述式。You can use to perform catalog operations (for example, querying the structure of a database or creating database objects such as tables); or to change the data in a database, without using a , by executing UPDATE, INSERT, or DELETE statements. 不同於，會傳回`rowid`做為輸出參數，如果您執行會影響一個資料列的 INSERT、 DELETE 或 UPDATE 陳述式。 differs from in that it returns `rowid` as an output parameter if you are executing an INSERT, DELETE, or UPDATE statement that affects exactly one row. 這可讓您用來唯一識別在 Oracle 資料庫中，可讓您提升效能相關的後續查詢中的資料列。This allows you to uniquely identify a row in the Oracle database, which can allow you to increase performance in subsequent, related queries. 雖然不會傳回任何資料列，而任何輸出參數或傳回對應至參數的值會填入資料。Although does not return any rows, any output parameters or return values mapped to parameters are populated with data.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance object ExecuteOracleScalar() cil managed

span.span: Executes the query, and returns the first column of the first row in the result set returned by the query as an Oracle-specific data type.

summary.span: 額外的資料行或資料列都會遭到忽略。

span.span: Extra columns or rows are ignored.

returns.span: 做為 Oracle 特定資料型別之結果集第一個資料列的第一個資料行；而如果結果是 ，則為 Null 值。

span.span: The first column of the first row in the result set as an Oracle-specific data type, or a null reference if the result is a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以從資料庫中擷取單一值 （例如，彙總的值）。Use the method to retrieve a single value (for example, an aggregate value) from a database. 這需要較少的程式碼比使用方法，然後再執行 產生單一值，從所傳回的資料所需的作業。This requires less code than using the method, and then performing the operations necessary to generate the single value from the data returned by an . 一般查詢可以進行格式化，如下列 C# 範例所示：A typical query can be formatted as in the following C# example: ``` command.CommandText = "SELECT COUNT(*) AS NumberOfRegions FROM Region"; count = command.ExecuteOracleScalar(); ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您預期您的 SQL 陳述式，傳回單一資料列，則指定`SingleRow`做為值可能會改善應用程式的效能。If you expect your SQL statement to return only a single row, specifying `SingleRow` as the value may improve application performance. 當屬性設定為`StoredProcedure`，則屬性應設為預存程序的名稱。When the property is set to `StoredProcedure`, the property should be set to the name of the stored procedure. 命令再執行這個預存程序，當您呼叫。The command then executes this stored procedure when you call . 支援特殊的模式，可讓大型二進位值，有效率地讀取。The supports a special mode that enables large binary values to be read efficiently. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < `SequentialAccess` 設定。For more information, see the `SequentialAccess` setting for . 多個可以開啟在任何指定時間。More than one can be open at any given time. ## Examples 下列範例會建立，然後執行它，藉由傳遞字串，是 SQL SELECT 陳述式和字串，用來連接到資料庫。The following example creates an , and then executes it by passing a string that is an SQL SELECT statement, and a string to use to connect to the database. 然後將設定為。 is then set to . remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以從資料庫中擷取單一值 （例如，彙總的值）。Use the method to retrieve a single value (for example, an aggregate value) from a database. 這需要較少的程式碼比使用方法，然後再執行 產生單一值，從所傳回的資料所需的作業。This requires less code than using the method, and then performing the operations necessary to generate the single value from the data returned by an . 一般查詢可以進行格式化，如下列 C# 範例所示：A typical query can be formatted as in the following C# example: ``` CommandText = "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Region"; Int32 count = (int32) ExecuteScalar(); ``` ## Examples 下列範例會建立，然後執行它使用。The following example creates an and then executes it using . 此範例會傳遞為彙總的結果，傳回的 SQL 陳述式的字串和要用來連接到資料庫的字串。The example is passed a string that is an SQL statement that returns an aggregate result, and a string to use to connect to the database. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Parameters As OracleParameterCollection

summary.span: 取得 。

value.span: SQL 陳述式或預存程序的參數。

span.span: The parameters of the SQL statement or stored procedure.
The default is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`StoredProcedure`，則屬性應設為預存程序的名稱。When the property is set to `StoredProcedure`, the property should be set to the name of the stored procedure. 使用者可能需要使用逸出字元語法，如果預存程序名稱包含任何特殊字元。The user may be required to use escape character syntax if the stored procedure name contains any special characters. 當您呼叫 Execute 方法的其中一個命令會執行這個預存程序。The command executes this stored procedure when you call one of the Execute methods. 將參數傳遞給 SQL 陳述式所呼叫的.NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle 不支援問號 （？） 預留位置的`CommandType.Text`。The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle does not support the question mark (?) placeholder for passing parameters to an SQL statement called by an of `CommandType.Text`. 在此情況下，您必須使用具名的參數。In this case, named parameters must be used. 例如: For example: ``` SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = :pCustomerID ``` 當使用具名參數的 SQL 陳述式中呼叫的`CommandType.Text`，您必須在參數名稱，使用冒號 （:）。When using named parameters in an SQL statement called by an of `CommandType.Text`, you must precede the parameter name with a colon (:). 不過，在預存程序中，或參考您的程式碼中的其他位置的具名參數 (例如，在新增時，才物件新增至屬性)，不在之前使用冒號 （:） 的具名的參數。However, in a stored procedure, or when referring to a named parameter elsewhere in your code (for example, when adding objects to the property), do not precede the named parameter with a colon (:). .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle 自動提供冒號。The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle supplies the colon automatically. ## Examples 下列範例會建立並顯示其參數。The following example creates an and displays its parameters. 若要這麼做，方法會傳遞，為 SQL SELECT 陳述式和陣列的查詢字串物件。To accomplish this, the method is passed an , a query string that is an SQL SELECT statement, and an array of objects. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleCommand.Parameters#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.Parameters/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleCommand.Parameters#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.Parameters/VB/source.vb#1)]

The default is a null value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您不能設定如果它已經設為特定的值，因此命令執行程序中的屬性。You cannot set the property if it is already set to a specific value, and the command is in the process of executing. 如果您設定交易屬性未連線到相同的物件做為物件時，會擲回例外狀況，下次您嘗試執行陳述式。If you set the transaction property to an object that is not connected to the same as the object, an exception will be thrown the next time you attempt to execute a statement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值值是`Both`除非會自動產生命令 (做為的情況)，預設值是在此情況下`None`。The default value is `Both` unless the command is automatically generated (as in the case of the ), in which case the default is `None`. 如需使用詳細資訊屬性，請參閱 < [DataAdapter 的參數](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md)。For more information about using the property, see [DataAdapter Parameters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md).
